meanings.definition: Originating in or carried by the blood.
meanings.sent1: The hematogenous disease affected his entire body.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the hematogenous infection started in the blood.
meanings.sent3: The hematogenous bacteria threw a party in his bloodstream.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like hematogenous whispers, spreading through her mind.
meanings.sent5: The hematogenous nature of the virus made it difficult to treat.

meanings.sent1: The cancer cells hematogenously traveled to other organs.
meanings.sent2: The medication hematogenously moved through his veins to reach the affected area.
meanings.sent3: The rumors hematogenously circulated among the students.
meanings.sent4: His love for music hematogenously flowed through his entire being.
meanings.sent5: The news of the victory hematogenously spread throughout the town.
